thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Marian Petrides, M.D.
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Marian Petrides, M.D.

author: Marian Petrides, M.D.
title: Marian Petrides, M.D.
text:
My dog had multiple vet visits, including visits to specialists over the last month. Each time the claim was processed fairly and rapidly, with turnaround uniformly within 7-10 days, once the very next day.
I am extremely pleased with Pets Best and would recommend them most highly. I chose Pets Best on the recommendation of a friend and she was right. They are superb.
